title: coinsmartotc
author: coinsmartotc
content: Hello Everyone,- Located in Canada- Orders over 25k CAD or 20k USD- Spreads are close to market spot prices- no slippage on buys and sells- Accept wire transfers in the USA - Signature Bank, Instant settlement- Accept wire transfers and Interac In Canada - Luminous Bank, Instant Settlement- Accept Wire transfers in Europe - Estonian Bank, Instant settlement- We provide 24/7 servicePersonally I provide services for:- Crypto buy & sell for cash | Up to any amount, over 100k have to give me 3 day notice.If you have anymore questions, please feel free to Email me @ winston.su@coinsmart.com or telegram: cryptoinsights0
